name: My Talking Cat Lily
summary: Your virtual pet is here! Play with talking cat Lily - purrfect virtual cat. What’s furry, playful and waiting to get your attention? It’s your new virtual pet! Start the adventure together with your talking cat Lily. Care for your virtual cat and make her the happiest feline ever! Love your talking pet like you’ve never loved any pet before! Download and play My Talking Cat Lily.
